After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures the availability of spare parts when needed.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: (Number of Spare Parts Available / Total Number of Spare Parts Requests) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to fulfill spare parts orders.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: Total Time to Fulfill Spare Parts Orders / Total Number of Orders

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.KPIS: Percentage of orders for incorrect spare parts
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of orders that contain incorrect spare parts.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: (Number of Incorrect Spare Parts Orders / Total Number of Spare Parts Orders) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures how often the inventory of spare parts is turned over.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: Cost of Goods Sold for Spare Parts / Average Spare Parts Inventory

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.KPIS: Warranty claims related to spare parts
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of warranty claims related to spare parts.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: (Number of Warranty Claims for Spare Parts / Total Number of Spare Parts Sold) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of spare parts that are obsolete.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: (Number of Obsolete Spare Parts / Total Number of Spare Parts in Inventory) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of spare parts that are returned.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: (Number of Returned Spare Parts / Total Number of Spare Parts Sold) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with spare parts availability
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.EXPLANATION: Measures customer satisfaction with the availability of spare parts.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Spare P.FORMULA: Average Rating of Spare Parts Availability from Customer Feedback
